sentences.english: Jeremiah used a scribe to write for him.
sentences.chinese: 耶利米用书记员来为他记录。

sentences.english: Jeremiah the tenth and Macbannai the eleventh.
sentences.chinese: 第十耶利米，第十一末巴奈。

sentences.english: Zephaniah the priest read this letter to Jeremiah the prophet.
sentences.chinese: 祭司西番雅就把这信念给先知耶利米听。

sentences.english: Zephaniah the priest, however, read the letter to Jeremiah the prophet.
sentences.chinese: 祭司西番雅就把这信念给先知耶利米听。

sentences.english: Then said the LORD unto me, What seest thou, Jeremiah?
sentences.chinese: 于是耶和华问我说，耶利米你看见什么。

sentences.english: It has to be "me" meaning Jeremiah,so the Lord says to Jeremiah.
sentences.chinese: 我“肯定是指耶利米，所以耶和华对耶利米说。

sentences.english: It has to be "me" meaning Jeremiah,so the Lord says to Jeremiah.
sentences.chinese: 我“肯定是指耶利米，所以耶和华对耶利米说。

sentences.english: And Zephaniah the priest read this letter in the ears of Jeremiah the prophet.
sentences.chinese: 祭司西番雅就把这信念给先知耶利米听。

sentences.english: When Jeremiah was entered into the dungeon, and into the cabins, and Jeremiah had remained there many days;
sentences.chinese: 耶利米来到狱中，进入牢房，在那里囚了多日。

sentences.english: Judah, and Benjamin, and Shemaiah, and Jeremiah
sentences.chinese: 犹大，便雅悯，示玛雅，耶利米。

sentences.english: And all the people were gathered against Jeremiah in the house of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 于是众民都在耶和华的殿中聚集到耶利米那里。

sentences.english: Jeremiah the prophet of God was put down a well as prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 上帝的先知耶利米被作为囚犯关到一座井中。

sentences.english: And Jeremiah remained in the courtyard of the guard.
sentences.chinese: 耶利米仍在护卫兵的院中。

sentences.english: And his mother's name was Hamutal, the daughter of Jeremiah of Libnah.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲名叫哈慕她，是立拿人耶利米的女儿。

sentences.english: His mother's name was Hamutal daughter of Jeremiah; she was from Libnah.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲名叫哈慕她，是立拿人耶利米的女儿。

sentences.english: The word of the LORD which came to Jeremiah the prophet against the Gentiles;
sentences.chinese: 耶和华论列国的话临到先知耶利米。

definition: Hezekiah or Ezekias (740-687 BC), twelfth king of Judah (Judaism)
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
